name: Tanigi - Trophy Gold Trilogy
description:
Within this tome are three Incursions, or areas to explore, investigate and quest in. They are designed for the Trophy Gold roleplaying game but can easily be used in other Fantasy roleplaying games.

The 3 incursions can be used separately but there are notes for linking them in a geographic area.

Trophy Gold Rules here - https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/293716/Codex--Gold-Aug-2019
